ygData.subject: RE: Speed of a bard
ygData.msgSnippet: I wonder if the GM/Guide bards have a percussion instrument that is above, and beyond, the Drum of Selo s March and/or Mistmoore Battledrum.  You should have
ygData.messageBody:
I wonder if the GM/Guide bards have a percussion instrument that is above,
and beyond, the Drum of Selo's March and/or Mistmoore Battledrum. You
should have offered to trade :)

Slightly off-topic :

I think Verant has done a wonderful job with the game. Unfortunately, if
you spend any amount of time reading the garbage on alt.games.everquest,
you'd be amazed at what some people will bitch about. Rubicite is a perfect
example.... for so long people have been whining about the camping, KS'ing,
and all the morons surrounding Rubicite. People also bitch that there is no
QUEST in Everquest (which I strongly disagree with). Anyway, Verant goes
in, removes Rubicite - adds new quests for class-specific armor and now
everyone is bitching that they took rubicite away!!! So outrageous. Also,
some warrior went on this huge rant about Lambent armor - he was disgusted
that it was better than rubicite and crafted and that Warriors should get
the "best" armor in the game. The funny thing is that I _never_ hear bards
bitching that it isn't fair that we don't have weapons equivalent to
Bladestorm, Langseaxe of the Wolves, Soul Leech, etc, etc. I just don't
understand some of these people.

Desmei Sightblinder
Lvl 30 Bard (Povar)


> -----Original Message-----
> From: James Schuldes [mailto:jgs@...]
> Sent: Tuesday, October 12, 1999 2:47 PM
> To: 'eqbards@onelist.com'
> Subject: RE: [eqbards] Speed of a bard
>
>
> From: James Schuldes <jgs@...>
>
> On Innorruk server I saw someone in black mail(?) maybe plate
> (blackened)
> and he was moving pretty fast so I kicked in selo's and my
> Mistmoore drum...
>
> OMG!! Can't catch him??? wtf??? He stops by Kith tunnel and
> I catch up and
> can see his name "Harmany" and I do a /w on him and...
>
> YIKES! He's a bard and a GM! (or maybe Guide) But WOO HOO!!
> We have a GM
> Bard! So, I say Hi and stuff and chat. I hope it helps us
> get some points
> across. TBH, I think Verant does listen and they do react
> but they set
> their own priority and have their own vision. I think they got very
> surprized at how their 'community' evolved so fast and are
> finally coming to
> grips with things - new zones, changing stuff that's over
> camped, dealing
> with KS'ers, etc.
>
> Sylly Songsynger
> Bard of the 32th song
> <Spirit of the Moon>
> somewhere on Innoruuk
>
> p.s. the reason I have not been posting much:
> 10-01-99 - welcome to level 30
> 10-04-99 - welcome to level 31
> 10-06-99 - welcome back to level 30
> 10-07-99 - welcome back to level 31
> 10-08-99 - welcome back to level 30
> 10-09-99 -- welcome back to level 31
> 10-11-99 - welcome to level 32 - WooHoo!!!
>

> explained to us

> killed by Nagafen.
> And from there a second guide guild was formed, an evil
> one...
>
> Anyways, i asked him if he would race me, i
> equipped my mm
> drum and blasted
> way ahead of him, but turned out he didnt have
> run on (duh)
